title: The Power of Rangers: A Franchise Legacy
description: Power Rangers is a long-standing multimedia franchise that began with 'Mighty Morphin Power Rangers' in 1993. Created by Haim Saban and others, it has expanded to include television series, films, and various merchandise, drawing inspiration from the Japanese Super Sentai series. The franchise continues to evolve and capture the imagination of fans worldwide.
prompt: A dynamic illustration featuring a diverse group of Power Rangers in their iconic colorful suits, showcasing their unique helmets and weapons. The scene is set in an urban environment with a large, menacing monster in the background, emphasizing the action and teamwork of the Rangers. Include elements of energy and light effects to signify their morphing abilities, with a vibrant sky and dramatic cityscape in the backdrop.
